REDCap Module

Source: R/mod_redcap_module.R
mod_redcap_module.Rd

This module contains all of the REDCap setup and instrument upload/download components.

redcap_connect_ui(id)

redcap_connect_logic(input, output, session)

redcap_initialize_logic(input, output, session, rc_url, rc_token)

redcap_connected_ui(id)

redcap_connected_logic(input, output, session, connect, rc_project_info)

redcap_instrument_config_ui(id)

redcap_instrument_select_logic(
  input,
  output,
  session,
  rc_connect_press,
  rc_connection
)

redcap_instrument_config_logic(
  input,
  output,
  session,
  rc_connection,
  instruments,
  instrument_selection
)

redcap_instrument_config_reviewer_logic(
  input,
  output,
  session,
  rc_instrument,
  rc_identifier,
  rc_connection
)

rc_instrument_configured_ui(id)

rc_instrument_configured_logic(
  input,
  output,
  session,
  rc_instrument_info,
  selected_instrument
)

redcap_instrument_ui(id)

redcap_instrument_logic(
  input,
  output,
  session,
  rc_connection,
  instruments,
  instrument_selection,
  rc_instrument,
  rc_identifier,
  rc_reviewer,
  rc_selected_reviewer,
  subject_id,
  reviewr_upload_btn,
  reviewr_connect_btn
)

upload_redcap_logic(
  input,
  output,
  session,
  rc_connection,
  rc_recordID,
  rc_instrument,
  instrumentData,
  previousData,
  currentSubject,
  rc_upload_btn_press,
  abstraction_complete,
  abstraction_complete_val,
  all_instruments,
  instrument_selection
)

Arguments

id

The namespace id for the UI output
input

internal
output

internal
session

internal
rc_url

A character string containing the REDCap API URL for your institution ex: https://redcap.ucdenver.edu/api/
rc_token

A password string representing your REDCap API token
connect

A press of the REDCap connect button from the Setup Tab
rc_project_info

The project information associated with your REDCap API key
rc_connect_press

A press of the REDCap connect button from the Setup Tab
rc_connection

A REDCap API connection object
instruments

All REDCap instruments associated with the project API key
instrument_selection

The user selected REDCap Instrument
rc_instrument

The user selected REDCap Instrument
rc_identifier

The field that contains the REDCap Identifier
rc_instrument_info

Information about the configured REDCap Instrument
selected_instrument

The currently selected REDCap Instrument
rc_reviewer

The REDCap field that holds reviewer names
rc_selected_reviewer

The selected reviewer from the list of previous reviewers (if present)
subject_id

The currently selected patient identifier
reviewr_upload_btn

A button press of the REDCap upload button
reviewr_connect_btn

A button press of the REDCap Connect button
rc_recordID

The REDCap Record ID for the currently selected subject
instrumentData

The user entered data currently present in the REDCap instrument
previousData

Previous Abstraction "Instrument Complete" Value
currentSubject

Abstraction data associated with the currently selected subject
rc_upload_btn_press

A press of the Upload to REDCap button
abstraction_complete

Person readable abstraction complete value
abstraction_complete_val

Machine readable abstraction complete value
all_instruments

All data abstraction instruments in the project
